wordpressPage.title: About Us
wordpressPage.content:
Youth Work Resource is a UK based site aiming to equip both paid and volunteer youth workers in their church & schools ministry. Unlike other resource websites YWR doesn’t just have session plans and games but also has useful forms for your youth work and a complete guide to residentials helping first timers plan a successful weekend away.

Site Management

Youth Work Resource is created and maintained by Mark Tiddy.Â Mark is a youth and schools worker with 15 years experience in youth ministry. Mark trained for 3 years with Oasis obtaining a BA Honours in Youth Work and Ministry and a JNC Level 2.

The History of Youth Work Resource

Youth Work Resource initially started as a sixth-form project by Mark which gradually evolved into a Youth Work Resource website as Mark wrote more and more resources he felt were worth sharing.

To date, YWR receives over 5000 unique visitors per month from across the world and has been providing quality Youth Work Resources since 2006.

To find out more about Youth Work Resource or to become a content contributor please Contact Us
